parameters.name: Search Query
parameters.description: Name of business or address to search for

parameters.name: Start Location
parameters.description: In plain text, such as 1 Infinite Loop, Cupertino, CA 95014

parameters.name: Destination Location
parameters.description: In plain text, such as 1 Infinite Loop, Cupertino, CA 95014

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: A string that contains latitude and longitude, separated by comma. Example: '37.44469,-122.15971'

parameters.name: Start Navigation
parameters.description: Pass 'yes' immediately begin turn-by-turn directions, without waiting for user to press the start button

parameters.name: URL for callback
parameters.description: Url scheme to call in order to return to your app

parameters.name: Callback app name
parameters.description: Name of your app, if using callback feature
